name: Wizards vs Scientists: A Chemystery
description:
Wizards vs Scientists is an RPG style story telling game that centers around the player trying to douse a conflict between the two factions: Wizards and Scientists. The main story has many themes that delve into a number of social and political issues, including treatment of the LGBTQ community, racism, treatment of soldiers, and the true meaning of war. Though only the beginning of the story is touched on in this demo, we hope that our points were able to be shown through the meetings of our characters.

"The premise is a post-war world where wizards and scientist, the two parties involved in the war, are now at a tolerable place with each other and acceptance on both sides for the other is growing. But with a murder mystery brewing behind the curtains, you must gain allies and solve the case before all hell breaks loose.

The future between both factions, whether peace or chaos, rests in your hands."

Game Team Members:

Tessa, Humaira, Kiernynn, Julia
